channel.title: Ancient Water Set "My Second Attempt at Armor Making"
channel.description: I was originally going to make ancient robes but i thought that's what ancestral robes were in rs and i was already half finished so this idea just popped into my head it's not a good one i know, i don't really have a good imagination if you would help me out by posting ideas on my next model that would be GREAT, well here it is i hope you enjoy if you don't keep it to yourself please. [IMG]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l634/lulatundead/AncientWaterSet.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l634/lulatundead/AncientWaterSet2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l634/lulatundead/AncientWaterSet3.jpg[/img] By the way, I was thinking of making a saradomin chestplate next does that sound good? or is it lame like this one...

item.title: Ancient Water Set "My Second Attempt at Armor Making"
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Death Infinity Death
item.description:
@Infinity_Death wrote:

I don’t have a copier and I’m not good at digital sketching either

Read full topic
item.source: Ancient Water Set "My Second Attempt at Armor Making"

item.title: Ancient Water Set "My Second Attempt at Armor Making"
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Infinity Death:

I don’t know but thanks I’m thinking of laying off modeling for a few months or at least until they start another modeling contest

Thats not a good idea, just keep at it and you’ll get better. Try sketching out models before making them, it tends to help me alot.

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient Water Set "My Second Attempt at Armor Making"
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Don’t they have a Sara chestplate already? I’m not sure, and the models are a little basic. The shield should be shapped more and maybe a little bigger, The swords fine but it doesn’t match the rest of it if you know what i mean. Also the weapons should have more to do with the robe, maybe put some black somewhere on the models? Like a black trim around the water drop shield and something black on the sword, it may help. Anyways, keep up the good work.

Read full topic
item.source: Ancient Water Set "My Second Attempt at Armor Making"

item.title: Ancient Water Set "My Second Attempt at Armor Making"

@Infinity_Death wrote:

I was originally going to make ancient robes but i thought that’s what ancestral robes were in rs and i was already half finished so this idea just popped into my head it’s not a good one i know, i don’t really have a good imagination if you would help me out by posting ideas on my next model that would be GREAT, well here it is i hope you enjoy if you don’t keep it to yourself please.

AncientWaterSet.jpg649×515

AncientWaterSet2.jpg648×512

AncientWaterSet3.jpg650×514

By the way, I was thinking of making a saradomin chestplate next does that sound good? or is it lame like this one…
